reconnaissance.query: sourcetype="raw-fortinet-fortigate" AND (action=block OR action=deny) AND src_ip IN (185.220.101.45, 185.220.101.46, 185.220.101.47)
reconnaissance.correlation_tip: Look for repetitive scanning patterns from same source IPs
Correlate suspicious domains with subsequent web requests
Check for scanning patterns targeting specific applications

initial_compromise.correlation_tip: Link email timestamps with subsequent user activity

initial_compromise.query: sourcetype="community-zscaler-latest" AND (action=blocked OR threat_name=* OR malware_category=*)
initial_compromise.correlation_tip: Correlate blocked URLs with phishing email links

initial_compromise.query: sourcetype="raw-crowdstrike-falcon" AND (ProcessRollup2 OR CommandLine) AND (powershell OR cmd OR rundll32)
initial_compromise.correlation_tip: Look for process execution shortly after web visits

credential_access.correlation_tip: Look for multiple failures followed by success from different locations
Correlate with Okta failures and MFA bypass attempts

credential_access.query: sourcetype="community-ciscoduo-latest" AND (result=FAILURE OR auth_device=*phone* OR factor_result=*)
credential_access.correlation_tip: Check for approval of unexpected MFA requests

credential_access.query: sourcetype="community-microsoftwindowseventlog-latest" AND (EventID=4624 OR EventID=4625 OR EventID=4648) AND LogonType IN (3,9,10)
credential_access.correlation_tip: Look for LSASS access and unusual logon patterns

lateral_movement.query: sourcetype="community-ciscoise-latest" AND (FailureReason=* OR AuthenticationStatus=fail OR RadiusFlowType=*)
lateral_movement.correlation_tip: Track device movement across network segments
Unusual internal traffic patterns between systems
Chain RDP sessions across multiple hosts

privilege_escalation.query: sourcetype="community-awscloudtrail-latest" AND eventName IN (AttachUserPolicy, CreateRole, AssumeRole) AND errorCode!=*
privilege_escalation.correlation_tip: Look for rapid privilege elevation and resource access
Unusual secret access patterns by compromised accounts
New admin privileges for previously standard users

data_discovery.correlation_tip: Unusual database enumeration and large result sets
Systematic bucket discovery and data access patterns

data_discovery.query: sourcetype="community-githubaudit-latest" AND action IN (git.clone, repo.access, org.member_team_add)
data_discovery.correlation_tip: Unusual repository access by compromised accounts

data_exfiltration.correlation_tip: Abnormal upload volumes to cloud storage services
Unusual DNS query patterns with large responses

data_exfiltration.query: sourcetype="community-netskope-latest" AND activity=upload AND (app=*dropbox* OR app=*gdrive* OR app=*onedrive*)
data_exfiltration.correlation_tip: Large file uploads to personal cloud storage

persistence.query: sourcetype="raw-harness-ci" AND (pipeline_modified=true OR webhook_created=* OR secret_access=*)
sourcetype="community-awscloudtrail-latest" AND eventName IN (CreateAccessKey, CreateUser, CreateRole) AND errorCode!=*

detection.correlation_tip: High-risk transactions flagged by fraud detection

detection.query: sourcetype="raw-crowdstrike-falcon" AND (DetectName=* OR ThreatHuntingStatus=* OR FileName=*suspicious*)
detection.correlation_tip: Endpoint detection of attack tools and techniques

issues: ⚠️ Sources without internal timestamps: fortinet_fortigate, crowdstrike_falcon, harness_ci
